articles.author: Samuel Agini
articles.title: Gianni Infantino sparks World Cup backlash with comments on football equality - Financial Times
articles.description: Fifa chief talks of women’s need to ‘convince us men’ ahead of final of successful tournament
articles.content: Fifa president Gianni Infantino provoked a backlash on the eve of the World Cup final after offering advice to women on the battle for equality in football, saying they had the power to convince us m… [+2436 chars]
